Text: Juniper Mailing Addresspst Junipers Mailing Address is McKinney Suite Houston TX Also all agreements have to be executed by Juniper GP LLC the General Partner for Juniper Energy LP Jesus sign all documents and is a Vice President of Juniper GP LLC Don Rollins Enron

Status of Audits Cash Recoveries Cc Following is a status of RAC initiated audits in and yeartodate cash recoveries related to the Merchant Investment Portfolio Oil Gas Joint Venture Audits Completed Program Operator Gross Claims Net Claims Vastar BP Amoco HughesRawls EPL E Sour Lake Adobe Total Oil Gas Joint Venture Audits Scheduled Program Operator Date Cypress Meridian Resources Juniper Bois DArc Resources Vastar Key Production Co Coal Venture Audits Completed Program Operator Gross Claims Net Claims Jupiter Cline Jupiter Cline Total DPR Cline The audit determined that contrary to the agreement excess funds were transferred to an investment account in Chris Clines name rather than DPR Potentially million was at risk to Enron The situation has been corrected Cash recovered in from Audits as of Oil Gas Oil Gas Coal Total Don Rollins Enron Corporation Risk Assessment Control

RE Status of Audits Cash Recoveries Cc Cash Recoveries take to months after the audit is performed The cash recovery is a small amount of the remainder to be collected claims vs collected The balance will be collected in the fourth quarter and the first quarter of The amount is cash received in from audits performed in Original Message From Buy Rick Sent Tuesday October PM To Rollins Don Subject RE Status of Audits Cash Recoveries Good job Recoveries down sharply in due to Rick Original Message From Rollins Don Sent Tuesday October PM To Carson Rick L Cc Buy Rick Gorte David Bradford William S Larson Bradford Melendrez Jesus Subject Status of Audits Cash Recoveries Following is a status of RAC initiated audits in and yeartodate cash recoveries related to the Merchant Investment Portfolio Oil Gas Joint Venture Audits Completed Program Operator Gross Claims Net Claims Vastar BP Amoco HughesRawls EPL E Sour Lake Adobe Total Oil Gas Joint Venture Audits Scheduled Program Operator Date Cypress Meridian Resources Juniper Bois DArc Resources Vastar Key Production Co Coal Venture Audits Completed Program Operator Gross Claims Net Claims Jupiter Cline Jupiter Cline Total DPR Cline The audit determined that contrary to the agreement excess funds were transferred to an investment account in Chris Clines name rather than DPR Potentially million was at risk to Enron The situation has been corrected Cash recovered in from Audits as of Oil Gas Oil Gas Coal Total Don Rollins Enron Corporation Risk Assessment Control
